name: Wiem Errouissi

projects.title: Dewini - Smart Healthcare App
projects.description: AI-powered health monitoring app developed with Symfony and JavaFX. Includes a chatbot to analyze symptoms.

projects.title: ACADEMIX - Smart E-learning Platform
projects.description: E-learning system using Spring Boot, Angular, and integrated Machine Learning for performance prediction and personalized course recommendation.

projects.title: Dynamic Pricing with ML
projects.description: Built a predictive model for conversion rate based on pricing using Kaggle data and deployed it with Flask in a Spring Boot e-learning platform.

projects.title: Import-Export Analytics with Power BI
projects.description: Designed a star schema data warehouse and built dashboards in Power BI to analyze sales, customers, and performance using DAX and KPIs.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: End-to-end development of full-stack web applications and embedded systems.

services.title: Data Analysis & BI
services.description: Building data pipelines, dashboards and KPIs using Power BI and EazyBI.

services.title: AI & Machine Learning
services.description: Design and deployment of ML models for real-world applications including pricing and recommendation systems.

services.title: Automation with Jira
services.description: Creating business process automation and dashboards in Jira using ScriptRunner and Groovy.

aboutpara: I am a second-year engineering student at ESPRIT with a strong foundation in Computer Science and a Bachelor's degree in Information and Communication Technologies. This dual academic background has shaped my ability to bridge software engineering with communication systems. Passionate about technology, I thrive in dynamic environments where I can design innovative solutions, automate processes, and solve complex problems. Recognized for my analytical thinking, creativity, and team spirit, I continuously seek opportunities to grow, contribute meaningfully, and turn ideas into impactful digital solutions.
